subject: Baseball
Vegetarianism
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Brewers’ Prince Fielder has become a lightning rod for his off-season decision to spurn meat and fish, including the bratwurst that tailgating Milwaukee fans hold so dear.
snippet: The Brewers’ Prince Fielder has become a lightning rod for his off-season decision to spurn meat and fish, including the bratwurst that tailgating Milwaukee fans hold so dear.
